args.text:
Some interesting websites related to octopus-inspired technology in marine biology:
- https://www.sciencenews.org/article/octopus-inspired-glove-suckers-humans-grip-slippery-objects
- https://www.theatlantic.com/science/archive/2017/10/octopus-inspired-material-can-change-its-texture/542598/
- https://www.bizjournals.com/boston/news/2022/05/05/octopus-inspired-skin-care.html
- https://www.icr.org/article/octopus-skin-inspires-high-tech-camouflage
- https://ocean.si.edu/ocean-life/invertebrates/tech-imitates-life-sneaky-sea-worm-inspires-soft-robots
- https://phys.org/news/2015-04-octopus-inspired-robotthe-fastest-underwater-robot.html
- https://scitechdaily.com/3d-printed-artificial-muscle-inspired-by-color-changing-octopus-skin/
- https://www.patternity.org/explore/index/octopus-inspired-camouflage/
